titles.title: Congratulating the Michigan State University men's basketball team on winning the 1999-2000 NCAA Men's Basketball Championship.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and the Workforce.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Postsecondary Education, Training and Life-Long Learning.

committee.name: House Committee on Education and the Workforce

committee.subcommittee: Postsecondary Education, Training and Life-Long Learning
committee.name: House Education and the Workforce

bill.summary: 4/13/2000--Introduced. Congratulates the Michigan State University men's basketball team (Spartans) for winning the 1999 - 2000 NCAA Men's Basketball Championship.
